divs: Sighting DetailsWhile sitting on the shore, after observing a very disturbing UFO, I saw a flash of white light, just above the big dipper. Shortly later, from the west, I observed a "star-like" light. I watched it, and that's when I noticed that it was moving in my direction. Having seen a couple of UFO's in the past, I did not panic, but sat still and watched it's progress, which was that it followed a straight path right in front of me! I was shaped like a blimp (but I called it a jelly-belly, because it was illuminated from with an orange glow). It traveled steadily from the west to the north east at a constant speed. It had no exterior lights, sound, nor did it seem to threaten me. I have owned an airplane and I know what they sound and look like. As I just said NO SOUND. I was delighted to see another one so soon. It simply traveled out of sight, and was gone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Glen Arbor
This sighting has never been favorited.
